meanings.sent1: The locked door kept us safe inside the house.
meanings.sent2: She found her bike locked securely to the rack.
meanings.sent3: The locked treasure chest held only old toys.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt locked, guarded against any more pain.
meanings.sent5: The locked gate creaked ominously in the wind.

meanings.definition: Unable to be opened or accessed
meanings.sent1: The locked safe contained all the valuable documents.
meanings.sent2: The locked diary held her deepest secrets.
meanings.sent3: The locked box refused to reveal its contents.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were locked away, hidden from view.
meanings.sent5: The locked room remained a mystery to all who entered.

meanings.sent1: The locked window wouldn't budge no matter how hard he pushed.
meanings.sent2: The locked wheels of the bike prevented it from rolling away.
meanings.sent3: The locked lid of the jar refused to twist open.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze was locked on the breathtaking sunset.
meanings.sent5: The locked anchor kept the boat secure in the harbor.

meanings.sent1: The locked account required a special code to access.
meanings.sent2: The locked gate blocked the path to the secret garden.
meanings.sent3: The locked website needed a password for entry.
meanings.sent4: His dreams felt locked behind a closed door.
meanings.sent5: The locked cabinet held the key to the mystery.
